name: Systematic Code Review
description: Structured code review methodology covering correctness, security, performance, and maintainability with severity-rated findings.

examples.prompt: Review this PR for security issues
examples.expected_behavior: Analyzes code changes for OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities, rates findings by severity, and suggests remediations

examples.prompt: Review the changes in this diff for correctness
examples.expected_behavior: Checks logic errors, edge cases, error handling, and provides inline comments with fix suggestions
